name: js
description: npm init -y npm install --save-dev typescript npx tsc --init ### we need update in the compiler options object with the netx atributes : the file tsconfig.json {   "compilerOptions": {     "target": "es2016",     "module": "commonjs",     "rootDir": "./src",     "outDir": "./dist",     "esModuleInterop": true,     "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,       "strict": true,     "skipLibCheck": true   } }
